card.title: SparkleDrake
card.description: A card imbued with the power of sparkling water blasts, capable of dazzling opponents and creating a shimmering barrier.

card.title: ThunderPuff
card.description: This card holds the essence of thunder clouds, releasing powerful electric puffs that can stun enemies and clear obstacles.

card.title: FlameWhisk
card.description: Harnesses the fiery spirit of a whisking flame, capable of swift fiery attacks and creating a shield of flames.

card.title: AquaBlitz
card.description: A card that channels the force of rapid water currents, unleashing blitz attacks that can sweep foes away.
